subject: Hockey, Ice
Lockouts
lead_paragraph: The number of canceled games is up to 135, but the N.H.L. hopes to reach an agreement with its locked-out players in time to start the season Nov. 2.
snippet: The number of canceled games is up to 135, but the N.H.L. hopes to reach an agreement with its locked-out players in time to start the season Nov. 2.
